content.detailedDescription: I have seen this for about a year and a half. i thought it was a star but noticed it changes coulars , it is not there every night and comes out about 45 minutes before dark. my son took a video of it and seen there is no way it is a star. i bought a telescope and started to observe it and take pictures of it every night that it was out which is about 5 nights a week. i have tried different settings on the camera and different cameras. two of the pictures i submitted where taken on november 11. i have over 100 pictures some using the telescope some not. this past summer i had the telescope set up in my driveway and the nights it was out would take pictures of it. it would stay out for about two and a half hours. i would really like to know what this is. thank you.Greg
content.summary: This is something i see out almost every night. it looks like a star of first glance but it moves and is only there for a few hours

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a cigarette.  my street runs in a west-east direction.  i was looking towards the east at the constellation orion.  upon finishing my cigarette, i tossed in the street and turned to re-enter my house.  i looked up to the north and saw what i first thought was a small group of white doves flying south.  i never took my eyes off of them because it was quickly apparent that they were not birds as they got closer. depth perception told me that they were higher than originally thought and there was no fluctuating pattern you see when you look at birds flying. there is a light haze in the sky but it's a cloudless night.  the four objects were flying in a " ( " formation.  they were not glowing.  they were a dull white/light gray color.  non-reflective.  boomer rang shaped.  maybe about 25 to 30-feet from wing tip to wing tip.  once they flew over, it appeared that they were between 800 to 1000-feet msl. they flew in a straight-line pattern. they were traveling in a ssw direction and traveling nearly 150-mph as they flew over me.  as soon as they passed over it didn't take long for me to lose sight of them.  i stood there for another 30-seconds, give or take before i entered my home and quickly called shephard afb in burkburnet, texas.  the dispatcher said he would relay the information to the tower.
content.summary: Four fast moving, boomer rang shaped objects

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in the backyard when i looked up an noticed a strange bright object high in the sky.. it moved from the west to the east hovering and then back to the west... it moved away from the clouds disappeared and then returned. i have no clue what it was and would love to find out... i have actual video footage of the event.. it lasted about 10mins.. when we zoomed in on the camera it had a dome shape. this was an amazing sight..
content.summary: Unknown bright object is sky over hialeah (miami-dade) fl

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from the store and near the moon there was a huge circle. i couldn't get a clear picture. i was holding my cat while looking at it again later and my cat started to freak out!
content.summary: A huge circle near the moon that stayed still for awhile.

content.detailedDescription: Last night november 8, 2011 in about 12:56am. again, i witnessed something in the sky that put me in shock. over the atlantic shores of st. augustine an unknown bright object in a ball shape with orange, purple, green and red lights and surrounded by black balls were drifting to the right in the sky for 25 minutes and then stop and turn into a large white bright ball with a light tale. the object did not make any noise but the intensity of light changed every 10 seconds.
content.summary: Ufo or asteroid over st augustine usa

content.detailedDescription:
I declare the below incident is true and accurate.
 i refuse any future use of the accounts of the below listed incident without expressed written approval/consent by me.  any person(s), or company(s) reproducing or re-enacting the below listed events without my permission will be held to answer in a court of law. the use of my name or any identifying information about me or my family is not allowed unless written permission is issued by me.    

we had moved into our new whittier california home in july of 2000. our residence sits close to the top of a hillside community three blocks from a fenced off mountainous area to the north of our residence.  the incident i���m sharing took place three months after we moved in approx around october 11th, 2000. also i feel i should note that somewhere to the north east of our residence inside the above mentioned wild uninhabited area is an old oil drilling facility that at the time of the incident had been dormant for many years according to local neighbors. presently there is a local political and social debate taking place regarding the reopening of the drilling facility. i was told that at this time tests and surveys are being conducted up in that previously abandon drilling area. there is activity taking place in the form of helicopters flying in and out of the area at all times of the day and night. i know the oil drilling has not been approved yet so i assume the activity is due to environmental study or site preparation in the case of a yes vote on its reopening. but in october of 2000 there was no activity in the mountain area.
i arrived home late from work on the night in question at approx. 2315 hrs to find my two young children asleep in their respective bedrooms and my wife asleep in our room which is at the very rear of the house. i checked on them and without changing out of my shirt and tie. i went to the living room and began to watch tv. the living room was dark, except for the light of the television. the only lights that were on in the entire house were that of the kitchen located, based on my sitting position in the living room, directly at my one o���clock as well as the laundry room light that is next to the kitchen. the local news was towards the end of its broadcast as the weather and sports reports is what i was able to view. it was then the incident began. 
i heard a distinct rustling taking place in the kitchen, like the noise made when one is opening a potato chip bag that had been rolled shut and clipped for a while. the noise caught me off guard because i was the only person awake in the house. from my chair i could look down the hallway to the bedrooms and would have seen if anyone had gotten out of bed and walked to the kitchen. besides the kids at this age never woke up after falling asleep and if they had stirred awake i would have heard them get out of their beds and they surely would have called out for me or my wife. my view of said hallway was unimpeded and from my sitting position in the living room was directly at my eleven o���clock. my heart raced as i knew none of my family members were actually in the kitchen. i became more alarmed as the rustling lasted a very long five to six seconds. i was in total belief that someone was in our kitchen. the noise was clear, slow and deliberate and there was no doubt that it was coming from inside our home and specifically from our kitchen. i was frozen.
i blurted out ���who���s up?��� for some reason, but there was no answer. the rustling immediately stopped i assume as a reaction to my verbalization. i was certain someone was in our home as my senses went wild. my hair on the back of my neck and arms stood up and i felt a burning sensation down my spine. in very stern and aggressive voice i blurted out again, ���who���s up?��� i was frozen in my chair, i prepared for a physical confrontation. i prepared to defend my family. i thought of securing a weapon and quietly as i sat in my chair took off my belt to use the belt buckle as a striking tool. i slowly began to stand and it was then the electricity to my home turned off. the tv and both lights in the kitchen and laundry room abruptly turned off. the house was completely dark and without power. my first thought was that the intruder(s) cut the electricity to aid there activity. i was in full red alert as i was certain i had a home invasion situation on my hands.
i stood and quickly walked to the kitchen belt buckle in hand prepared for a life or death struggle. i planned on grabbing a knife the first chance i had. the soft moonlight that spilled in from the kitchen window illuminated the kitchen slightly. as i turned the corner from the living room into the kitchen i saw nothing, no one. i did not hear footsteps of someone retreating away from me or out the laundry room door or to the rear of the house. i quickly confirmed the laundry room door was shut and locked. i realized i needed to clear the house room by room. could have the intruder fled down the hallway as i rounded the corner from the living room to the kitchen? possibly, but not very likely as i would have heard such activity. i armed myself with a knife and a flashlight and went down the hall to clear the rooms. my son���s room was first. he was dead asleep. i looked under his bed and in the closet while keeping an ear out for any noise in the hallway behind me or any other areas of the house i had not yet cleared. i moved onto the next child���s room and found him dead asleep as well. i cleared the room as well with no signs of anything out of the ordinary.
the children���s bathroom is what i cleared next, nothing out of place. onto the master bathroom witch is connected of course to the master bedroom. the master bath room was clear. as i began to exit the master bathroom i was moving slowly and listening for any noises in the house. i was at the threshold of the master bathroom entering the master bedroom. at the threshold i was approximately 9-10 feet away from the foot of our king size bed that sits directly in the middle of our bedroom. once again i was 9-10 feet away from the foot of our bed. i was startled by what i saw next. my wife who had been asleep during the entire incident to this point was oddly sitting upright on her side of the bed. i did not notice if she had been sitting up as i entered the master bath seconds prior. nevertheless she was sitting erect and this caused me to stop my gait immediately. i was now one foot past the master bath threshold standing in my bedroom, once again approximately 9 feet away from the foot of the bed. she then whispered in a perturbed tone ���why were you standing over me?��� remaining still i responded, ���i just walked in the room, i wasn���t standing over you.��� she replied whispering and even more upset, ���someone was standing at the foot of our bed looking down on me, it woke me up, i know what i saw!��� my heart raced again as i placed my index finger of my right hand to my lips urging her to be quite. i cleared our bedroom as my wife sat in the bed with the blankets up to her nose. the master bedroom was now clear. the only place the intruder could be is in the last room of the house, the office! i shushed my wife again not having time to share all that had transpired and deliberately set out to clear the office.
i cleared the office in a few seconds finding nothing. i came back to the master bedroom and advised my wife to get up out of bed and to follow me. she tried to turn on a lamp and i advised her that the power was out. she hurriedly followed me as we stopped in to check on each child as we made our way back to the living room. i also cleared all the rooms again as we moved forward through the house. once in the living room i asked her to describe what she saw at the foot of our bed and she could only convey that it was a tall dark figure and that she thought it was me. i reiterated that i was at no point at the foot of the bed and that i had just then walked into the master bathroom and began to exit said bathroom when i noticed her sitting upright. it was then i was able to describe to her all that had happened to me the past 10 minutes in short but concise detail. she asked several rational questions about the incident and i reconfirmed the points she had inquired about. she lit a few candles and decided to call the power company to see what was wrong with the power. 
i peered through our large living room window and did not notice anything out of the order. the one street lamp that sits on the opposite side of our street, three to four houses east, was on as was the power to the residents across the street as i could see a few porch lights on. i opened the front door and walked out onto our porch. i had a strange heavy feeling on my chest and felt uneasy. i found this to be odd as i had calmed down completely from the earlier night events. as soon as exited our front door i felt anxious and edgy for some reason. i noticed that the power was out on all the residences on our side of the street, the north side as it were. there were no porch lights on our side of the street and that was not the norm.
i came back in the house and told my wife that i was going to take a walk up the street to see if the power to the residences north of us was out. she went ballistic. she told me under no uncertain terms that she did not want me to leave her and the kids alone in the house especially after the events i had told her that transpired minutes earlier. she grabbed my right arm and begged me to stay in the house with her. i would not be denied. it was as if i was compelled to go outside and take a look around. i felt like i was being drawn to investigate the night���s activities further. what happened next was unbelievable.
i walked down my residence walk way and stood in the street for a second or two. there are no sidewalks in our neighborhood so i walked w/b on the street under the cover of the huge 50 year old fichus trees that line the street. i reached the corner which is two houses west of my home. i looked north bound and saw that several porch lights were on telling me that the power was not out in all the residences to our north. i walked north on california street about half a block and a strange eerie feeling came over me again, i felt scared for some reason. i turned around and walked south bound back to my street. i turned left and headed back east bound towards my house. the fichus trees on the block drop theses dark burgundy berry type pods and they were all over the street. if you step on the freshly dropped berries you will inevitably bring them into the home as they stick to the bottom of ones shoes. the berries will stain the carpet as we had found out on a prior occasion. i was looking down, to avoid stepping on said berries, as i walked back to the house using the faint moon beams that were shining through the fichus trees monstrous branches. my gait could be likened to a person hoping stones as they cross a shallow creek attempting not to get wet. i began to feel slightly more relaxed as i got closer and closer to my house. i glanced up and noted the moon light that was creeping and dancing through the branches and was thankful it was lighting my path on the street. i looked back down careful not to step on the previously described berries when suddenly the entire street was lit up in an extremely bright white light. 
initially i stopped walking and was dumbfounded as to where this light was coming from. i looked to my left and right simply taking in the scene that had changed in a second. i then looked up into the trees and observed intense white beams of light piercing through the branches of the trees every chance they could. the light was intense and occasionally i would need to squint because of the brightness. i was frozen as my mind was unable to explain the sudden appearance of the light seemingly out of nowhere. as i continued to peer up at the tree and the light, i could tell that the light source was of course above the trees and was slowly moving in a southerly direction from the mountainside. the light was so bright i couldn���t accurately tell what the height of the light source was or what object or vessel was emitting the light. all i could tell was that it was moving slowly southbound and it was directly over my house now. if i had to estimate the light sources height i would have to say less than 250- 300 feet. less than a football field would be my most educated guess.
 the light continued to move slowly southbound at what appeared to be approximately 5-7 mph at best. the light was now directly over the middle of the street and the light beams continued to shine through the trees branches down onto the street. i remember looking down at the street again to marvel at the brightness of said light.  i took several steps forward keeping the light source in my vision at all times. i found myself not under the protection of the trees any longer. i was now in open space in the middle of my street almost directly in front of my house. the residence directly across the street does not have a fichus tree in the front yard and this allows an unimpaired view of the sky looking southbound. the light source was now more or less over the house directly across the street from my residence. 
there was no sound emitting from the slow moving light source. no chopping of blades such as you would hear from a helicopter. there was no jet engine or propulsion noise present. there was no green or red aviation flight lights present as well. the light source was too low to the ground to be any craft i have ever seen. suddenly the light accelerated forward and parallel to a speed i can only describe 10-15 times faster than that of a meteor racing downward and across the sky heading entering our atmosphere. 
the light source travelled an immense length air space in less than one second. if i had to estimate the distance it travelled i would have to say approximately 30-40 miles in the previously described one second of time. at the time of its parallel acceleration not a sound was emitted from the light source, it remained absolutely silent in its forward motion and the light became smaller in size almost instantly. the light source size was that of a grape from the position i continued to observe it from.  
then the light source took a vertical trajectory, comparable to a child sliding ���up��� not down a slide. the light source during this upward trajectory increased speed and was traveling even faster than it had during its initial parallel acceleration. the size of the light source at its last visible observation as it turned upward was now that of a small pea.  suddenly it was gone, simply disappearing out of sight and, what i believe to be, out of our atmosphere.  
i was unable to move, i was frozen staring at the area of the sky where the light source once was. my heart was beating fast and loud. i felt sick to my stomach. i had no idea what i had just witnessed but i knew in my heart that there was no way that source of that light was from anything on this earth. the speed was greater than anything we as a civilization can possibly have at our disposal.
i walked up to the front door of my house and my wife opened the door. she had the portable phone to her ear and was on hold with the power company. she slowly removed the phone from her ear dropping it down to her side. she was looking at me with a facial expression of concern. she said ���what���s wrong with you, you look like you seen a ghost?��� i stared at her without saying a word. she said ���your pale, get in the house, what���s wrong?��� my response was ���i just saw a ufo. i can���t explain what i just saw.��� i asked her if she had seen the light over the house and she advised that she had not and that she had been in the den on hold with the power company. it was then that the power company employee came on the line and advised my wife that there was a small pocket of outage in our area. my wife asked her if she knew why and the operator advised that she wasn���t sure why. my wife asked how long before the power would be back on and the employee stated ���we need to find something wrong before we can fix it and right now we don���t show any blown transformers or downed power lines.��� my wife hung up the phone and not 5-10 seconds later the power came back on causing us to jump. i explained to her what i had observed outside our home and reiterated that when i got to the door on my way back that i looked shaken. 
the events depicted above are absolutely true and accurate. i have told a few friends and family members of the facts surrounding the events described above but have neglected to officially report said incident.  i am reporting the incident now so that the occurrence can be documented for possible future reference.
content.summary: I beleive something was in my home, then i saw it slowly fly over my house

content.detailedDescription: The object was a trangular  shape i first seen it over  the tree line hovering thenn it  turned to the  right  and moved slowly  and extremely  silentlyit had white exterior lights on the (pulsating)and a  redish-blue blinking light towardsthe center-top
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufoseffner

content.detailedDescription: Ufo
content.summary: Bright ufo in the southern sky of louisiana

content.detailedDescription: While driving south of tampa fl, we noticed 3 streaks/lines of lights in the distance.The area near the lights appears to be around macdill airforce base. at first i saw one streak & commented that it was a comet. as soon as my daughter looked, she noticed the second streak. at that point, i looked again (i was driving)and saw all 3 streaks. i was thinking comets but then noticed none of them were moving across the sky like comets do. then i thought planes maybe? with chemical vapor trails, but again, they weren't moving, that we could notice. it was then confirmed that they weren't moving when an a plane flew across the sky under the lights & we saw all four objects in view. the plane was about 5 times smaller than each streak or line of light and they were not moving at all. the plane was probably in approach to tpa and again it flew under the lights, to give you an idea of altitude. the lines/streaks of light were angled in a way that you could connect them to form a huge triangle. there was no sound. we were late getting to an event at my daughters school & when we came back out they were gone. we did not see them disappear. this was about 5:50 p.M. wed. nov. 9, 2011. i cannot explain what they were, except that they were not planes, comets, flares, skydivers and i really don't think it could have been a cloud light, or reflection of any kind, being constant & linear for an extended period of time. they did not fade like vapor trails but maybe??? everybody around us in traffic was looking too.
content.summary: 3 streaks of lights,not moving,above an aircraft approaching tpa, each was about 4/5 times the size of the plane. they were angled toward each other as if to form a triangle. the seemed to be around the area of macdill airforce base in tampa.

content.detailedDescription: I came back to my house from 1week trip and after enterance to yard i saw some movments and several objects with diffrent shapes arounnd the yard wals and over it, human likes there was very incridible then i goes near and take some pictures by my mobile phone , when i repeat isee some of them take some thing like camera toward me and consequently my mobile hanged on ( no key acts). i realised some thing they cary upward and to right hand like escenteric engine shaft, the face & body of them start to changes. i reset my mobile by put off battery cell and insert again and this time i start to take movie of them, about 45 second of those movments recorded, then suddenly my surronding went dark and phone hangedup again. after all i realised all of them wents. now i have several pictures and 1 movie cilp from this scene.All with out retouch and real.I ready show to some one specialist about this case and  some times i saw one or up to three of them with transparents ufo around that place . even i could take some other pictures. its very important & serious which i treatend by them when i try to arrange and save photos and movie! i khow this is very hard to belive but i promise all are only real experience of me!
content.summary: Cleaver with unkwon technology

content.detailedDescription:
Around mid-october, 2008, i was delivering newspapers around 2:30a est. the location was near valley, alabama (but more nearer to the small community of beulah). while crossing a bridge that went over lake harding on lee county rd. 279, i noticed a triangular shaped object hovering just above the treeline. the object appeared to be around a football field and a half from the bridge over a few houses. at best guess, it was some 75 feet in the air. two blue-white lights were in what i believed to be the rear of the vessel. underneath, i could make out a reddy-orange lightthat at times seemed to shine to the ground (almost like a hand held spot light). i watched this go on for around 25-30 minutes approximately. it almost seemed as if the vehicle was searching or looking for something. that is just the impression i had at the time.

still having almost 100 newspapers to deliver; i traveled on to my customers. this took about an hour and i decided to go back to the area to see if the craft was still there. remarkably it was! however, it had "floated or hovered" down the tree line a ways and eventually went out of my field of view back into a wooded area that was gated. i want to also point out that i witnessed no beings or aliens but, i did witness a full grown panther (gender unknown, about the size of a lab retriever dog) walk from one side of the road to the next an go behind a small country church. amazingly, in one nights time; i witnessed my first ufo and saw a panther (that according to the state, are not supposed to be in alabama).

i came home later that morning and immediately got on the web to try and find a similar craft akin to what i'd witnessed. loand behold i did, and in fact found upwards of around ten puported triangular shaped ufo's. some were identical while other depictions were similar but different. if memory serves correctly, i thought upon what i had seen for about a week before contacting a mr. robert patterson of mufon alabama. we had about an hour long conversation and his information was very helpful.
content.summary: Triangle hovering above tree line over lake harding as if it were searching for something

content.detailedDescription: On friday nov 4 6:15pm 2011, very clear evening,was distracted by strange swooshing sound.A triangular object,abought the size of a pickup truck passed over head.The corners of the object were squared off.It was silver mettalic in color,and no wing or exhaust were visible.It had one white light on, in bottom of craft. there were three other circular items, one in each corner of bottom of craft. all of these circular items, inclding the center light were mounted flush with bottom of craft. as craft continued on its sw course it turned on very large lights which i believe were coming from each corner of craft.A large red light in front, a green and blue light in back. a sister and my brother were in field several hundred yards south of me also experienced the loud swooshing and seen the object from the distance.My brother had just retired from military and could not identify object nor sound. several years ago i had an encounter with a huge black triangular object in this same spot.It made no sound at all,and had remained motionless for several minutes above me just above tree tops.When it moved off it was on the same course but moving opposite direction.
content.summary: While deer hunting nov 4 2011 6:15pm heard strange whooshing sound, i did not recognise this sound from anything i ever heard. i looked around than finally up. a silver shaped triangle ship was passing overhead .A brother and sister also witness

content.detailedDescription: During my walk i see falling stars and meter showers all the time. i love looking at the stars ahead of me as i am walking. this was totally differnt.The time was 6.00 to 6.03 am. a very white, bright, round light appeared from no where. it was about the height a small plane would be flying and about the size of a greatfruit. very round in shape. moving across the sky pretty fast. then it stoped for about 3 to 4 seconds, got even brighter then exploded and disappeared all at the same time. no trail, no falling things and no sound. my daughter thought it might be a satellite falling. i told her if that was the case no higher than it was we would have seen stuff falling from it. this was a perfect round circle, and you would think we could have heard somthing. i would like to know what it was.
content.summary: My daughter an i were walking our morning walk, about 6.00 am we looked up and seen a very very bright light, round in shape going across the sky, no tail like a falling star or meter. then it stoped and burst apart nothing was falling, it just disappeard

content.detailedDescription: Last night at around 8:35p.M. mountain standard time, i left my home to return a movie to the redbox at the maverick.  as i was returning home i noticed a blinking light in the distance off to my left in the direction of my subdivision.  at first i thought it was a star, then the light smoothly rotated in a clockwise direction.  i slowed my car down and watched it more intently as i drove into towards my house, and the light again rotated in a clockwise direction.  at this point i had moved closer to the object, and was able to make out the shape of the object.  it was a huge triangle, and from what i could tell the blinking light was at the front.  as i became parrallel to the object it started to move. it started in the direction of my house so i sped up trying to get home to tell my family.  as i pulled into my garage the objectalmost cover my house, moving at a steady pace.  i ran into my house and yelled for my wife, two sons, niece, and her husband to come look.  i was in the house for no more than five seconds, and when we all got back outside we could still see the object, but it was way off in the distant.  this thing was covering some distance, and made no sound whatsoever.  my two sons and i sat outside discussing it for a while, and about five minutes after we had lost sight of the object a fighter jet flew over our house headed in the same direction as the triangle we saw.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I had noticed bright light in sky for a while no stars were present.  curious i got my camcorder out and starting videooing and realized what i was seeing was changing shapes such as spheres and cigar like shape.  so night after night i'd go out and same exact time the "ufo" would appear so i started looking aroud and realized that approx a mile down the road the exact object is in align with the one above my house.  however the other object travels the other way.  the more you watch the sky the more you realize what you glance at and believe are stars are actually other objects and i have videoed several.  last night total count actually surounding my house was approx 10.  i do live on 100+ acres so area is large.  i'd love for someone to come and investigate just not sure who to contact.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Sphere
content.summary: I observe these sightings every night of the week  appears more as time go on saw about 10 last night  have video

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were standing on our balcony facing east at 7 at night in zichron ya'akov isreal. we were looking at the city skyline when i noticed a bright orange light in the sky. at first i thought that it was mars because the positioning was right but it was far too bright.The object then disappeared before my girlfriend saw it. seconds later it reappeared, brighter than before, and this time she saw it as well. then it faded and grew brighter again, so bright that it was almost blinding, then it rose in the air and started moving to the left fading as it did so. then it stopped abruptly, faded from view, and became the blinding orange light that it had been before. it started moving to the right extremely quickly, and as it was moving, it started fading then blinking. it then disappeared from sight altogether. the incident altogether was about 10 minutes.
content.summary: An extremely bright light in the sky which pulsed and faded then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was cleaning my car at about 11:30 a.M.On 11/09/2011 and i happened to look up into the sky. i saw a white cigar shaped aircraft moving slowly from a nw to se direction. there was no sound and no exhaust trail of any kind. i noticed that there were no wings on this craft which was the feature that made me stop and look more closely at it. i tried to determine if it was a blimp, but it was moving in a completely straight line. i did not have my phone or a camera or binoculars of any kind. it was high up in the sky but it was not above any cloud cover. the day was beautifully sunny with a blue sky and just a hint of cloud formations at random in certain point of the sky. i followed the object across the sky for approx 2 minutes, observing a reflection off of the surface of the craft which i presumed was from the sunlight reflecting off of it. the sun was straight up in the sky and behind me so i was not looking into it. i then thought to look in the trunk of my car for some binoculars. the trunk was open because i was cleaning it and i looked down, moving some stuff around to see if i have my binocs. when i looked up, the object was gone. my initial feeling on this craft was that it was a balloon or some kind of blimp. it seemed to just float across the sky. approx 5 minutes later i observed 3 aircraft, all planes (i could see their wings and exhaust trail) moving in the sky in the exact opposite direction (se to nw). these aircraft were obviously planes with wings and exhaust trails. they seemed to be at 3 different altitudes in the sky. i believe this because they all seemed to be different sizes and the exhaust trails were different depths of thickness. i know this is a generalization but i made note of it to determine how far away they were from one another. the first aircraft came across the sky followed by the other two a good distance behind. the two behind the first one were separated by a good distance as well from n to s. i followed these aircraft until they passed above my house and off in to the distance to the n. the whole thing from beginning to end was about 20 minutes or so. i have seen other strange things in the sky here before because we are in a very rural area and the sky is very open to us in most all directions. this is the first time i have seen this type of craft in the sky and also the first time i have seen something unusual during the daylight hours with the sun shining brightly and a clear sky. as a follow up, i have lived out here in the country for 15 years now and am familiar with the wildlife. this was no bird or living creature.
content.summary: White, cigar shaped moving slowly, no sound, reflective surface.

content.detailedDescription: Two of us observed a sparkling reddish-orange object moving slowly across the sky, west to east. it left a tail behind it similar to what a comet would. it was moving slower than a meteor or airplane, but still moved pretty quickly. the object made no noise that we could hear. there were no blinking lights either. i tried to capture on video on my blackberry, but the object was indistinguishable on it. the other observer suggested it may be one of those luminary bags that you light and let off, but it stayed up and travelled horizontally across the sky for approximately 5 minutes until it went behind the trees and we could no longer see it.

I was outside waiting on freinds to come over play cards..Wife was letting dog get releif..Facing fredrick road..Iwas taking pics of a star in sky..Turnedto say something to my wife..Ilooked up thats when i saw it..When i first seen object i thought dang the star i have been taking pics of finaly moved and was out of its normal place..However i looked over my left shoulder it was still there...The object i was seeing was exactly like the star in the sky i have been taking pics of scince i firstnoticed it august ..31..2011....Only this one instead of bein white with two white spikes of light coming fromright side and a red.Blue..Green light ..This object was identical accept..Bigger ..And its main color not white but amber in over all color..My feelings were wow i can finaly get a close up pic.Of the  star ive bein wacthing..Only this was a different star..I lost sight of object ..I watched ittravel east about a half mile.From my house i walked out on to fredrick road looking to folly quarter road..The object slightlyto the right of fredrick roadand folly quarter road over a feild ..It doubled in  size and just like someone turning a light switch on or off it was gone dissapeared..My camera comes back on..
content.summary: Uot side facing fredrick road..Looked up saw star like object tree top level try get pic camera died red pink  white lined on screen then diedcame on object was gone...

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 4am on november 5 2011.  i just arrived home and parked the van in the driveway.  i got out of the van and looked south towards orion's constellation and was observing stars.  i saw a few planes very far away as i was observing the stars.  

i was simply enjoying star gazing when out of the blue came the object.  it flew right over my head, going fairly slow, about 2,000 feet in the air.  it caught me off guard because it flew right over the lone cloud that was floating right above me.  it was a very thin/low lying cloud, and i hadn't noticed the object beforehand so i was quite startled.  

any ways, i had a very clear view of it for about 2 minutes.  for 20 seconds it was right above me, heading west to east at a fairly regular speed if not slow.  the object had orange lights on the outside, a yellowish orange.  the lights were curved, and it appeared almost exactly like this ( )  in the center of the lights was a dull, rotating red light that seemed to be blinking randomly.  by rotating, i mean it was moving around in the shape of a square in the center of the yellowish orange lights.  it was blinking at each corner if that makes sense, yet it seemed random and off center.  any ways, the craft made no noise yet it was right above me.  

i searched online and began to believe that it may have been an airplane with it's landing lights turned on.  however, the next night i went outside and observed at around 2am, and a plane flew above me again at a much higher altitude with it's landing lights on.  i was still able to see this planes blinking white exterior lights and a clear view of the red blinking light.  it also made noise even though the altitude was much higher than the object i saw the night before.  

this is my 2nd ufo sighting in my life; the first being at the beginning of october this year in which i saw 2 dull white lights flying above me at 500 feet or so that made no noise and was eerily inconspicuous.  i wrote this after seeing 2 reports in the last week of almost the exact same craft i saw just a few days ago.  

i attached a sketch that gives a 'sketchy' example of my microsoft paint skills.  the darkness is the sky, the white is the cloud.  i'd like to talk to someone about this, preferably the people who reported the exact same craft (the guys in minnesota who witnessed almost exactly what i saw)

email me at:   [email address removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Regarding nc after meeting and minnesota account/orange w/ red center

content.detailedDescription: We saw 2 red lights in the distance with 1 white light far above it. we got out of the car and 3 flew above us at very low speeds and altitude. they were heading in toward marfa (marfa lights?)to the west. after it flew by and got in the distance a 4th craft appeared and they all turned to the left back in the direction they came from then toward for davis to the north. a 5th craft flew directly above us, lower and slower. it was a dark triangle with 1 red and white light on each side and one bright white light in the front, like headlights. all of them made quiet sounds, like a really quiet jet but with a hum.
content.summary: 5 triangle shaped craft with 1 red and white light on each side, 1 bright light in front.

content.detailedDescription: The object seen had three equally spaced white lights. when first spotted the object was low to the horizon and appeared to be hovering.  after i made a quick trip inside to get my binoculars the object started moving very slowly.  the object moved from south west to the north not crossing directly over head but, about 80 degrees to east.  it appeared to be triangle, delta or boomerang in shape through my binoculars.  i never heard any sounds coming from the craft. after passing i did see one red light and possible other white light flashing.  the strobing lights did not match the pattern of commercial jets that i often see over head.  no green lights were seen from the object indicating port and starboard sides of an normal air craft. life flight helicopters fly daily over our house making trips to our local hospital about three miles away.  at night these helicopters are quite noisy and have only one very bright light that are pointed downward. i am a sky watcher and love to watch the overhead air traffic.  the most worthy things about my sighting are the three bright lights being equally spaced apart and probably on a fairly large object.  also, no noise at all from the very slow moving object.  i have good hearing and often look up when commercial jets pass over.  i am 62 years old retired telephone company central office repairman.
content.summary: Much larger than stars and much smaller than helicopters that fly over our home.

content.detailedDescription:
At 10.20am on wed the 9th of nov 2011, on port wakefield road heading towards the city, near the salt lakes/wetlands, my best friend and i had just set out on a drive to take myself to an appointment on the otherside of adelaide. the road curved slightly and brough us onto the dead straight part of port wakefield road, when my best friend and i instantly noticed an extremely bright, reflective like object on the horizon around the tree tops (christmas shaped/like trees)! immediately and without any doubt in either of our minds (both being through and through ufo/et believers, myself having researched and been exposed to it my life) ruled out that it was any type or plane/aircraft reflecting the sun, due to it shape, size, brightness, location and at first what seemed like to be stationary!
the more we drove towards it (even though it would have been at least 3-5k away, over the adelaide hills/cbd direction) we noticed it was also moving/hovvering very slowly to our left! the change in the "reflection" or ligh sorce was making it also obvious that it itself was moving, as we were also driving in a forward straight direction!
we both ruled out a number of things it would possibly be just due to its location and shape and the biggest fact of all, in my best friends 29 years of living in this general location/area and driving a countless amount of times down this section of highway in nearly all times of the day and night, and myself also for many years, had never ever seen even something vagely resembling or comparing to this, leaving us both heart body mind and soul agreeing that is was a ufo of some kind!
as we drove further along the road, reaching our slight right hand turn off, stopping at the lights (turn off of port wakefield onto sailsbury highway) as i ducked down to look through the car stopped infront of us' windscreen to watch part of it slowly go behind the very tip of a tree top, i got the feeling/thought come over me as i watched the colours of it have a slight blue tinge (even tho it was extremely bright, like a reflection, which is the best word i can use to discribe it, even though there is nothing in that area/location/height that would reflect sunlight, plus it was in the east-south easterly direction, and the sun was not fully centre sky but still slightly westerly), that what i was looking at was light being projected outwards, not reflecting, but it gave such a luminous, bright, sharp, glare like a reflection which as ive said many times now, it just could not have possibly been!
we turned off onto sailsbury highway and lost sight of it due to the tree line right beside us, close by buildings/factories and small sand/land mounds/hills.
i continued nearly all he way to my appointment at marion, on the other side of adelaide(city) from where our trip started, looking and searching and almost jumping around in the car to get every possible direction covered to find out where it had gone/which direction it may have still been in....But without any luck :(
we both still remain adimate in our belief of what it was, if only souly for the fact that nothing even minutely close has been seen where this ufo/object was witnessed.
even after explaining the story to my mother, a 30year + ufo/et/truth researcher, and former ufo research network member who recieved and documented phoned in sightings for many years, also a current member of many ufo groups - aura, auforn etc, could not give me any other explaination or answer, she was also suprised/shocked/excited and amazed!
there have been many recent ufo sightings and acitivly in south aust, or people are finally starting to speak up again at least! also we have just experienced a heavy 5 day haarp wave period, leaving the usual suspect clouds and skies and bringing in the random weather change! 
weither or not all of this is somehow connected, i do not know, but what i do know is the closer we approch some very signifigant and import times for us humanbeings (especially our higher/inner/astral selvs) the more n more strange events keep happening!
content.summary: Extremely bright, reflective type object, slowly hovering in clear view on horizon by tree tops, never anything close to resembling it seen in area/location before!

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on buchanan street, with the winston-salem skyline directly ahead about 2+ miles from my position. the sun had just gone down, so it was almost twilight, but still plenty of light (not yet dusk). the day was perfectly dry and clear with no visible clouds in the sky. just seconds before i turned right onto beth avenue, this enormous craft appeared right where i had been looking toward downtown winston-salem. my first thought was that i had never seen the wachovia building looking like that, but simultaneously i felt disoriented because my "landmark" was out of proportion - it was wide, misty and hovering. i seemed very close. in a split second i realized that i was seeing; what came to my mind was "a mothership". it was huge!

it seemed to be oval with a dome. i got an impression of textured, slightly reflective surface, barely distinguishable windows and a few widely spaced lights. most of the lights where white, with a couple of blue-green lights and a rose-colored (not red) light. i couldn't see the entire ship because it was surrounded by a mist/diffuse cloud that gave me the impression that it was trying to blend into the city skyline.

i was already turning onto beth avenue, so i continued to trent street and turned left so i was once again facing the winston-salem skyline with the wachovia building directly ahead. that building should have been clearly visible, as usual from that postion/distance. however, the craft had moved closer to downtown seemed to have moved directly in front of/over the wachovia building. the mistiness had increased so that all that was visible was the lights and i couldn't see the wachovia building. it was as if the craft was trying to mimic or swallow the building.

i felt extremely disoriented because i couldn't see the buildings i knew were there. it was like some sort of optical illusion was obscuring them. i felt so disturbed that i just couldn't look at it for more than a couple of minutes. i went home, went inside and just thought about what i had seen. i went back to the same spot on trent street to look at the skyline about 15 minutes later. that misty obscureness was gone and the skyline looked just as it normally does. it was dusk by then, but not completely dark. the sky/local atmosphere was perfectly clear, just like it had been all day.
content.summary: Large craft with misty aura obscuring edges its edges. increasing diffusion/density of aura until craft's body no longer distinguishable.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside enjoying the night air and stargazing about 11:15 pm, observing the night sky for an astronomy class i'm taking in college. while i was facing east and admiring the constellation of orion i saw a red ball streak across the sky super fast from the ese direction streaking towards the ene to enw direction (approximately about 11:20 pm). i first thought my eyes were seeing a glare since i was wearing glasses. i remained outside and gazed in the ese area a little while longer and did not have the same experience twice. i am certain that i either saw a red meteor from a red dwarf star that's near the end of its life...Or...A speeding ufo. {according to the local newscast meteorologists the largest meteor was to streak past the earth tuesday evening. they clarified it would not be visible to the naked eye.} the height(elevation) in the sky would have been about one fist from horizon in the ene near orion and as it sped ene/enw it gained in height(elevation) from the horizon about 3 fists before it disappeared from my view about 4 fists height from horizon thanks to a parking lot lamp at my apartment complex. per my astronomy class it would be awesome to have it clarified that i saw a red 'falling star' and not a speeding ufo. i didn't know any other website other than this ufo reporting site to report even for possible falling stars. if this was indeed a red meteor falling star...Let me know the right website to report falling star/meteor sitings, please.
content.summary: Red star like ball streaking thru southeast to northeast area of sky

content.detailedDescription: While waiting for friends outside a restaurant at 8:00, i turned to see a silver/gray ovoid object traveling in an arc across the sky. the size of the object caught my eye, as it was much bigger than a star, and about half the size of the almost full moon. the path the object took was similar to that of a shooting star, but it was moving much too slowly to be a meteor, and it has a clearly defined shape and color. it also appeared to be leaving a trail of white vapor behind it, giving it the appearance of a gray egg with a stubby comet tail. i immediately recognized that it was not an airplane due to the lack of red and blue lights, and i've seen helicopters, airplanes and shooting stars before. this was unlike anything i've ever seen. the most incredible aspect of this object was the fact that after only a second in my sight, it disappeared as though it had passed behind an invisible curtain. it was suddenly and completely gone. there were no clouds in the sky, and i have no explanation for the object or its sudden disappearance.
content.summary: Saw an ovoid silver object leaving a comet-like trail that suddenly and completely disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Every evening, for approximately 1 1/4 hours in the pre dawn hours before sunrise (approximately 5:00a.M. - 6:15a.M., now with daylight savings 4:00a.M. - 5:15a.M) my entire family and i have seen on average of 6 to 12 objects that each tell its own story.  but they all have one thing in common, that they look like a star that is moving in the sky.  occasionally, they stop, and restart.  another will change direction.  another will appear out of nowhere, wobble along a path until it eventually fades out, where yet another will shoot off.  i am so absolutely 100% positive that they occur every night that i am able to get a clear view.  my interest and reason why i go outside each night is because i know in my heart they are abnormal objects.  i have read that official airplanes, helicopters, will flash by faa regulation.  i invite any person from your organization to witness them here any time you would like.  i will be going out this evening, as it is relatively clear.  my greatest frustration is that i have no way of photographing this objects.  an odd detail is that whenever i think i have seen the last one of the evening and am heading inside, i take another look up, and there it goes over me...So i stay and watch it, and sit down waiting for more.  when i am about to call it quits again, yes, it is weird, but there another one goes.  this happened last evening, where at first my eyes adjusted to just one, they are usually single, but this time there were two, not far in distance (1/2 inch) is the only measurement as i cannot judge how far away they are...And they were traveling straight, one ahead of the other at the same rate of speed, and same brightness, like a dull star.  at first i thought one disappeared, so i watched the remaining one.  several moments later, i saw it approaching a faint star, or what i thought was a star.  it was not a star, as it rejoined the other object and they traveled together again.  i am so convinced that these objects are not a plane, or satellite, that i wish i had the equipment to record them.  i do have a telescope, but it is impossible to track one of these through the telescope...I know, and have given up on trying, as you cannot lock into the objects as they move too fast.  one more odd thing occurred the other night.  as inappropriate as it may seem, after a very quiet evening of stargazing, and after seeing the first "traveling star" for the evening, i did not want to go inside to use the bathroom, so i went outside.  i suddenly felt very uncomfortable, creeped out, when i heard a crash into my neighbors trees, maybe 150 feet away.  then i heard something run through a small wooded section of my front yard towards me, about 75 feet away. i radioed my son, who came to the door.  he suggested that i come inside, (i believe he is starting to worry about my health as i am so troubled by what they could be my sleep has been thrown off a tad). being too interested and excited about these objects, i stayed outside and decided to walk towards it.  as i did, i made noise and stomped my feet.  i heard the rustling of leaves running away from me into my neighbors yard.  i wasn't going to follow it into the dark. when i started to return to my yard, half way across my yard i stopped, and heard the rustling coming closer to me again. i am not sure if this is just a coincidence, as i do have wild turkey and deer where i live, so i cannot be sure.  i just felt that the timing was off, as while going to the bathroom outside i felt very vulnerable and uncomfortable, as if i were being watched.  i admit it could be just my imagination, and a fat turkey made a landing, and then ran through the woods, i will never know.  i do not think, however, that normal turkey or deer behavior was exhibited, as they usually stay away after you shoo them away...They do not come back towards you, then disappear without hearing noise of their departure. for, after i tried to frighten whatever was making the noise away, i heard nothing after that but some falling leaves.  i continued to observe shooting stars, and then these other objects i report to you, which are definitely not the same as the shooting stars we also see.  thank you, and please feel free to inquire as i am more than happy to share this with people who are more knowledgeable on the subject, with the hopes that you may know what we are seeing.   (names moved to fi box) cms 11/08/11 23:11 cdt flg
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Star like steady white lights seen pre dawn every night

content.detailedDescription: I went outside because i heard the dogs barking.  i walked out onto my front porch and saw a bright light appear and then disappear.  i ran into the house to get my husband.  when i returned, there were no lights.  then, one light appeared, then another. they were not moving.  just bright and stationary. then they both disappeared after 15 seconds.  meanwhile many blinking white lights (jets) moved into the area along with the sound of jets, coming from the direction of fort worth, tx.  when the large lights disappeared, the jets left in the direction of ft. worth, tx.  i saw very unusual lights before in january of 2010 and ever since i am very conscious of lights in the night sky.  i never reported these lights because other people had already reported sightings in dublin and stephenville.  however, my recollection did not match theirs exactly.
content.summary: Very bright light appeared, disappeared, reappeared, then another appeared, both disappeared
